pullrequest.title: Design document for dynamic world load

content.raw: Yes, I assume that they were static at the beginning at least. I never thought about models with initial speed. About the dynamic load of the heightmap there was no mention at the beginning, but we can discuss if it should be included on this document or on a different one.
content.html: Yes, I assume that they were static at the beginning at least. I never thought about models with initial speed. About the dynamic load of the heightmap there was no mention at the beginning, but we can discuss if it should be included on this document or on a different one.
